member.name: T:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection
member.summary: Collection of ClassInfoItem Items.

member.name: T:PyDoc.IStatCollection
member.summary: Collection of Statistics.

member.name: P:PyDoc.IStatCollection.ParentStat
member.summary: Get/Set a reference to the Parent Statistic.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection.#ctor(PyDoc.IDrillableStat)
member.summary: Create a new Instance of the ClassStatCollection Item.
member.param: Reference to the parent statistics controller.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection.Add(PyDoc.ClassInfoItem)
member.summary: Add a new item to the collection.
member.param: Reference to the item to be added.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection.Document(PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection,System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Individually document each class in the specified collection.
member.param: Collection of classes to document.
Target file folder to which rendered files will be written.
member.returns: Value indicating success, if true.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection.EnumerateClasses(PyDoc.ClassInfoItem)
member.summary: Return an enumeration of the child classes of the specified instance.
member.param: Reference to the class for which sub-classes will be enumerated.
member.returns: Formatted list of member classes.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection.EnumerateMethods(PyDoc.ClassInfoItem)
member.summary: Return an enumeration of the methods in the specified instance.
member.param: Reference to the class for which methods will be enumerated.
member.returns: Formatted list of member methods.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection.EnumerateVariables(PyDoc.ClassInfoItem)
member.summary: Return an enumeration of the variables in the specified instance.
member.param: Reference to the class for which variables will be enumerated.
member.returns: Formatted list of member variables.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection.Parse(PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection,PyDoc.TextLineCollection,System.Int32,System.Int32,PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection)
member.summary: Parse a class and its members.
member.param: Collection of variables to which matching items will be appended.
Collection of source text lines to inspect.
Current line index within the source file collection.
Current source indent spacing from left margin.
Collection of comments not yet assigned to objects.
member.returns: The new index at which to continue searching for the next entity.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection.Summarize(PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection,PyDoc.IDrillableStat,System.String)
member.summary: Summarize the members of this collection for inclusion in an enumeration.
member.param: Reference to the collection to be inspected.
Reference to the parent statistics controller.
Description to place within the section, as it applies to the caller's context.
member.returns: String containing formatted text that can be included in a host file.

member.name: P:PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection.ParentStat
member.summary: Get/Set a reference to the Parent Statistic.

member.name: T:PyDoc.ClassInfoItem
member.summary: Information about a class and its makeup.

member.name: T:PyDoc.ContainerBase
member.summary: Base class used to create full container items.

remarks.para:
This class doesn't include the static Parse method with the signature:
public static int Parse(XInfoCollection values,
TextLineCollection lines, int index, int indent,
CommentInfoCollection comments)

or the static Pattern property with the signature:
public static string Pattern { get { return mPattern; } }
Parse method and Pattern property must both be implemented by you.

member.name: T:PyDoc.IDrillableStat
member.summary: Type of Statistic that can be drilled down indefinitely.
member.remarks: In this application, the drillable entities are File, Methods, Classes, and Conditional Logic items. However, only Files, Classes, and Methods are extracted this version.

member.name: M:PyDoc.IDrillableStat.GetDocName
member.summary: Return the full document name of this item, including the prefixes set by parent objects.
member.returns: Full document name of this item, including prefixes set by parent objects.
member.remarks: This method does not include the file extension, since documentation can be written in different file formats. The final extension will be appended by the formatter.

member.name: M:PyDoc.IDrillableStat.GetFile
member.summary: Return a reference to the file in which this item is found.
member.returns: Reference to the file containing this object, if found. Otherwise, null.

member.name: M:PyDoc.IDrillableStat.GetMemberName(System.String)
member.summary: Return a reference to a member variable instance, class definition, or method definition having the specified name.
member.param: Name of the class or variable to search for.
member.returns: Reference to either a variable or IDrillableStat constituting the member, if found. Otherwise, null.
member.remarks: The search only includes direct members of the item starting the search.

member.name: M:PyDoc.IDrillableStat.GetObjectName(System.String)
member.summary: Return a reference to a variable instance or class definition to set the scope for the next search.
member.param: Name of the class or variable to search for.
member.returns: Reference to either a variable or IDrillableStat constituting a valid scope, if found. Otherwise, null.
member.remarks: The search only includes branches and imports at the current level and above.

member.name: M:PyDoc.IDrillableStat.IsClass(System.String)
member.summary: Return a value indicating whether the specified name is a class in the current scope.
member.param: Name of the entity to search for.
member.returns: True if the specified name represents a class. Otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PyDoc.IDrillableStat.IsVariable(System.String)
member.summary: Return a value indicating whether the specified name is a variable in the current scope.
member.param: Name of the entity to search for.
member.returns: True if the specified name represents a variable. Otherwise, false.

member.name: P:PyDoc.IDrillableStat.DocPrefix
member.summary: Get/Set the documentation prefix of this item.

member.name: P:PyDoc.IDrillableStat.Name
member.summary: Get/Set the name of the item.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerBase.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new Instance of the ContainerBase Item.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerBase.ClearAll
member.summary: Clear all collections.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerBase.GetDocName
member.summary: Return the full document name of this item, including the prefixes set by parent objects.
member.returns: Full document name of this item, including prefixes set by parent objects.
member.remarks: This method does not include the file extension, since documentation can be written in different file formats. The final extension will be appended by the formatter.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerBase.GetMemberName(System.String)
member.summary: Return a reference to a member variable instance, class definition, or method definition having the specified name.
member.param: Name of the class or variable to search for.
member.returns: Reference to either a variable or IDrillableStat constituting the member, if found. Otherwise, null.

remarks.para: The search only includes direct members of the item starting the search.
The main difference between GetObjectName and GetMemberName is that GetObjectName will drill outward if a match is not found at this level. GetMemberName searches only at the current level.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerBase.GetObjectName(System.String)
member.summary: Return a reference to a variable instance or class definition to set the scope for the next search.
member.param: Name of the class or variable to search for.
member.returns: Reference to either a variable or IDrillableStat constituting a valid scope, if found. Otherwise, null.

remarks.para: The search only includes branches and imports at the current level and above.
The main difference between GetObjectName and GetMemberName is that GetObjectName will drill outward if a match is not found at this level. GetMemberName searches only at the current level.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerBase.GetContainerInfo(PyDoc.ContainerBase,PyDoc.TextLineCollection,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a reference to a filled Container Info describing the contents of the caller's instance.
member.param: Abstract container having the traits of ContainerBase.
Collection of source text lines.
Current index within the source text collection.
Current indent level at which parsing is active.
member.returns: Reference to the container that generically describes the contents of the caller's instance.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerBase.GetFile
member.summary: Return a reference to the file in which this item is found.
member.returns: Reference to the file containing this object, if found. Otherwise, null.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerBase.IsClass(System.String)
member.summary: Return a value indicating whether the specified name is a class in the current scope.
member.param: Name of the entity to search for.
member.returns: True if the specified name represents a class. Otherwise, false.
member.remarks: This call will drill outward if a match is not found at the current level.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerBase.IsVariable(System.String)
member.summary: Return a value indicating whether the specified name is a variable in the current scope.
member.param: Name of the entity to search for.
member.returns: True if the specified name represents a variable. Otherwise, false.

member.summary: Get a reference to the collection of Classes appearing in this level.

member.summary: Get/Set the Name of this Item.

member.summary: Create a new Instance of the ClassInfoItem Item.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ClassInfoItem.Parse(PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection,PyDoc.TextLineCollection,System.Int32,System.Int32,PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection)
member.summary: Parse the contents of a class and its members.
member.param: Sibling class definitions at this level.
Source text lines.
Current line index within the source.
Current indent level.
Collection of comments directly preceeding this class, as in the case where documentation for a class is written in front of the class declaration.
member.returns: Next active index in the source. That value might be equal to or larger than the index parameter.

member.name: P:PyDoc.ClassInfoItem.Pattern
member.summary: Get the pattern for partially matching a Class.

member.name: T:PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection
member.summary: Collection of CommentInfoItem Items.

member.name: M:PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection.Add(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add an item to the collection by member values.
member.param: Comment text to add.
Line number associated with this entry.
member.returns: Reference to a newly created and added comment.

member.name: M:PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection.AddRange(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add a range of comments to the collection.
member.param: Range of comments to be added, as delimited by newline characters.
Line index at which the comment was found in source.

member.name: M:PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection.Parse(PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection,PyDoc.TextLineCollection,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Parse the comments at the current and following lines.
member.param: Collection of comments to which matching items will be appended.
Collection of source text lines to inspect.
Current line index within the source file collection.
Current source indent spacing from left margin.
member.returns: The Line Index following the comments.
member.remarks: The line in lines[index] must start with optional space and a comment sign, or no comment will be found in this call.

member.name: M:PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection.ToString
member.summary: Return the string representation of all comments in the collection.
member.returns: Combination of all comments in this collection, joined by newline.

member.name: T:PyDoc.CommentInfoItem
member.summary: Information about a Comment.

member.name: M:PyDoc.CommentInfoItem.IsComment(System.String)
member.summary: Return a value indicating whether the caller-specified value is a Comment.
member.param: Text value to inspect.
member.returns: True if the caller's value can be identified as a comment. Otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PyDoc.CommentInfoItem.Parse(PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection,PyDoc.TextLineCollection,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Parse a single Comment into the caller's collection, and return the next active line index.
member.param: Collection of comments to which matching items will be appended.
Collection of source text lines to inspect.
Current line index within the source file collection.
Current source indent spacing from left margin.
member.returns: Next line index to process. This method will return the value of the index parameter if no matches were found.

member.name: P:PyDoc.CommentInfoItem.LineNumber
member.summary: Get/Set the Line Number at which this instance was found.

member.name: P:PyDoc.CommentInfoItem.Pattern
member.summary: Get the partial pattern for matching a full line comment.

member.name: P:PyDoc.CommentInfoItem.Value
member.summary: Get/Set the Value of this Item.

member.name: T:PyDoc.ContainerInfo
member.summary: Container of references used to pass information about the current level.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new Instance of the ContainerInfo Item.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ContainerInfo.#ctor(PyDoc.ContainerBase,PyDoc.ClassInfoCollection,PyDoc.ImportInfoCollection,PyDoc.TextLineCollection,PyDoc.LogicInfoCollection,PyDoc.MethodInfoCollection,PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection,System.Int32,System.Int32,PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection)
member.summary: Create a new Instance of the ContainerInfo Item.
member.param: A reference to the calling object, to be referenced as the parent of the following collections.
Reference to the active collection of classes, or null.
Reference to the active collection of imports, or null.
Reference to the source text line collection.
Reference to the active collection of unimplemented conditional logic entries, or null.
Reference to the active collection of methods, or null.
Reference to the active collection of variables and expressions, or null.
Current index within the source text lines collection.
Current indent level under observation.
Collection of comments to be filled with any unassigned comments found at the current level.

member.name: T:PyDoc.ExpressionStack
member.summary: Stack of ExpressionItem Items.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ExpressionStack.ExpressionEntities(System.String)
member.summary: Return a list of all named entities found in the caller's expression.
member.param: Expression to inspect.
member.returns: Collection of all entities found in the expression, if any. If no entities were found, a empty collection is returned.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ExpressionStack.FunctionClass(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the class-access hierarchy portion of a function call, if any.
member.param: The expression to inspect.
The starting index at which to begin searching within the expression.
member.returns: If class-access is present, either instance-based or static, the class access sections of the call are returned. Otherwise, an empty collection is provided.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ExpressionStack.FunctionName(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the function name portion of a function call, if any.
member.param: The expression to inspect.
The starting index at which to begin searching within the expression.
member.returns: Name of the function, if found. Otherwise, a blank string.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ExpressionStack.FunctionStarts(System.String)
member.summary: Return a list of function calls starting locations for the caller's expression.
member.param: Expression to analyze.
member.returns: Int collection of 0-based string indices at which functions can be identified as starting, if found. Otherwise, an empty collection.

member.name: M:PyDoc.ExpressionStack.Push(System.String)
member.summary: Push a new item onto the stack by member values.
member.param: Text value to push to the stack.
member.returns: Newly created ExpressionItem.

member.name: T:PyDoc.ExpressionItem
member.summary: Entry in the stack.

member.name: P:PyDoc.ExpressionItem.Value
member.summary: Get/Set the basic value of this item.

member.name: T:PyDoc.FileInfoItem

member.summary: Parse the content of the file specified in SystemFile, and return the result.
member.param: File to parse.
Physical source input directory.
member.returns: True if the operation was successful. Otherwise, false.

Comments to be associated with the new item.

Current indent level.
Collection of comments directly preceeding this class, as in the case where documentation for a class is written in front of the class declaration.
member.returns: Next active index in the source. That value might be equal to or larger than the index parameter.

member.name: P:PyDoc.MethodInfoItem.Pattern
member.summary: Get the pattern for partially matching a Method.

member.name: T:PyDoc.NameValuesCollection
member.summary: Collection of NameValuesItem Items.

member.name: M:PyDoc.NameValuesCollection.Add(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add a single Name and Value to the list.
member.param: Name to add, if unique.
Value to add.
Value indicating whether the value parameter should be added to the collection unconditionally, or only in the case that it will be unique in the Values collection.
member.returns: Reference to a newly created NameValuesItem, if the name was unique in collection. Otherwise, a reference to the previously existing item.

member.name: M:PyDoc.NameValuesCollection.Add(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add an item by member values, inserting multiple values, as appropriate.
member.param: Name to be added to the collection, if new, or to be appended to if the name already exists.
Collection of values to add to the item with the specified name.
Value indicating whether each of the values must be unique in the collection to be appended to the Values collection, or whether they will be added unconditionally.
member.returns: Reference to a newly created NameValuesItem, if the name was unique in collection. Otherwise, a reference to the previously existing item.

member.name: T:PyDoc.NameValuesItem
member.summary: Helper item for storing multiple values under a single name.

member.name: P:PyDoc.NameValuesItem.Name
member.summary: Get/Set the Name of this item.

member.name: P:PyDoc.NameValuesItem.Values
member.summary: Get a reference to the collection of values on this item.

member.name: T:PyDoc.Program
member.summary: The main instance of the PyDoc application.
member.remarks: This application creates readable, cross-referenced information from Python source.

member.summary: The command-line startup of this application.
member.param: Command-line arguments, following the syntax of /argName[:argValue]

member.name: M:PyDoc.Program.Run
member.summary: Run the configured instance of the application.

member.name: P:PyDoc.Program.Files
member.summary: Get a reference to the collection of files on this instance.

member.name: P:PyDoc.Program.ShowSyntax
member.summary: Get/Set a value indicating whether to show the usage syntax.

member.name: P:PyDoc.Program.Verbosity
member.summary: Get/Set the Verbosity level of this instance.

member.name: P:PyDoc.Program.WaitAfterEnd
member.summary: Get/Set a value indicating whether to wait for keypress after the end of the application.

member.name: T:PyDoc.Utils
member.summary: Common utilities for this application.

member.name: F:PyDoc.Utils.mAssembly
member.summary: One-time load of Assembly info. Will stay active until application shuts down.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.GetCommentSingle(System.String)
member.summary: Return any single line comment present in the caller's string.
member.param: Source text to inspect for comments.
member.returns: Any single-line comment found on the line.
member.remarks: This version is capable of looking around all quote types to find the comment at the end, ignoring any false signal found inside the quoted text.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.GetIndex(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match,System.String)
member.summary: Return the source index of the specified Group in the caller-specified Match.
member.param: Reference to the instance of the match to inspect.
Name of the group for which the index will be retrieved.
member.returns: Character index of the match group in the source string, if found. Otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.GetLength(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match,System.String)
member.summary: Return the length of the specified Group in the caller-specified Match.
member.param: Reference to the instance of the match to inspect.
Name of the group for which the length of the match will be retrieved.
member.returns: Length of the matching group, if found. Otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.GetRelativePath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return the relative directory name, using the difference between the base and a comparison.
member.param: Base path to serve as the root.
Path to be compared with the base.
member.returns: Difference between base and comparison paths, if a difference existed. Otherwise, an empty string.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.GetResourceTextEmbedded(System.String)
member.summary: Return the text found in the specified embedded resource.
member.param: Full name of the embedded resource. Recall that embedded resources are prefixed by the default namespace for the project. In this case, PyDoc.
member.returns: Text from the specified embedded resource, if found. Otherwise, an empty string.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.GetTail(PyDoc.TextLineCollection,System.Int32,System.String,System.Text.StringBuilder,PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection)
member.summary: Find and set the tail content in the caller's string builder, returning the next active line.
member.param: Collection of source text lines.
Current index within the source text collection.
Pattern to be matched in order to find tail.
Target content string builder.
Comments found on the content that will need to be handled by the caller.
member.returns: Next active line, if tail found. Otherwise, -1.

remarks.para: The product of this method appears in the target string.
The comments collection may contain comments that need to be assigned to this object once it is successfully identified and instantiated.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.GetValue(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match,System.String)
member.summary: Return the value of the specified Group in the caller-specified Match.
member.param: Reference to the instance of the match to inspect.
Name of the group for which the value of the match will be retrieved.
member.returns: Value of the match found in the specified group of the provided match, if any. If no match or group were found, the return value is an empty string.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.GetVariableAssignment(PyDoc.TextLineCollection,System.Int32,System.Text.StringBuilder,PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection)
member.summary: Find and place the variable expression content in the caller's string builder, returning the next active line.
member.param: Reference to a collection of source lines.
Current index within the source lines collection.
Target string builder that will receive the full assignment text of the expression.
Comments encountered that will need to be handled by the host.
member.returns: Next active line, if assignment found. Otherwise, -1.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.IsTerminated(System.String)
member.summary: Return a value indicating whether the specified string is terminated.
member.param: Value to test for fully terminated expression.
member.returns: True if the value has no enclosing characters, or is fully terminated. Otherwise, false.
member.remarks: In this environment, value termination is bound by starting and ending quotes, brackets, and parenthsis, as well as the presence or absence of trailing punctuation. For example, a comma at the end of the line indicates that more is following on the next line.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.ParseAll(PyDoc.ContainerInfo)
member.summary: Parse all members of the current level.
member.param: Reference to an abstract container that might have multiple classes, methods, and variables.
member.returns: Next line index within the source. If no matches were found at this level, this value will be equal to the container.Index value.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.QuoteIsOpen(System.String)
member.summary: Return a value indicating whether a quote is open at the end of the provided line.
member.param: Value to inspect.
member.returns: True if quoted text within the value has been left unterminated.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.RemoveCommentSingle(System.String)
member.summary: Return the supplied line with any single line comment removed.
member.param: Text to inspect.
member.returns: Source text with any single-line comments removed.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.RemoveFileExtension(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Return the caller's filename with the extension removed.
member.param: Filename to inspect.
Value indicating whether any path portion found on the filename should be retained in the result.
member.returns: Filename without extension.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.ReplaceNonAN(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return a value where the caller's non-alphanumeric strings have been replaced.
member.param: Value to inspect for non-alphanumeric characters.
Pattern to insert in place of any non-alphanumeric characters found.
member.returns: Version of value that has had all instances of alphanumeric characters replaced with the replacement pattern.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.ReplaceNonAN(System.String,System.String,System.Char[])
member.summary: Return a value where the caller's non-alphanumeric strings have been replaced.
member.param: Value to inspect for non-alphanumeric characters.
Pattern to insert in place of any non-alphanumeric characters found.
Non-alphanumeric exceptions to allow. For example, dash and underscore are commonly legal in named entities.
member.returns: Version of value that has had all instances of alphanumeric characters replaced with the replacement pattern.

member.name: M:PyDoc.Utils.ToHtml(System.String)
member.summary: Return the caller's content, formatted for HTML.
member.param: Content to format.
member.returns: Caller's content, valid for inclusion within HTML.

member.summary: Get the constant portion of the Statistics File Footer.

member.summary: Get the constant portion of the Statistics File Header.

member.summary: Individually document each variable in the specified collection.

Reference to the output file folder.
member.returns: Value indicating success, if true.

member.summary: Return a list of enumerated calls made from this variable.

Name of the variable to enumerate for.
member.returns: Formatted list of function calls placed by this variable.

member.name: M:PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection.EnumerateObjects(PyDoc.IDrillableStat,PyDoc.NameValuesItem)
member.summary: Return a list of enumerated classes referenced from this variable.

Name of the variable for which object references will be enumerated.
member.returns: Formatted list of object references made by the specified variable.

member.name: M:PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection.EnumerateReferences(PyDoc.IDrillableStat,PyDoc.NameValuesItem)
member.summary: Return a list of enumerated variables referenced from this variable.
member.param: Reference to the parent statistics controller.
Name of the variable for which references will be enumerated.
member.returns: Formatted list of references to other variables made by the variable of the specified name within this scope.

member.name: M:PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection.GetCommentsForName(PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Return all of the comments found in the collection for the specified variable name.
member.param: Reference to the variables collection to be searched for matching names.
Name of the variable for which comments will be returned.
member.returns: Concatenated string of all comments assigned to the variable of the specified name.

member.name: M:PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection.GetName(PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Return the first item from the collection having the specified name.
member.param: Reference to the variables collection to search.
Name of the variable to find.
member.returns: Reference to the first item found matching the specified name, if found. Otherwise, null.

member.name: M:PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection.Parse(PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection,PyDoc.TextLineCollection,System.Int32,System.Int32,PyDoc.CommentInfoCollection)
member.summary: Parse a variable and its constituents.
member.param: Collection of variables to which matching items will be appended.
Collection of source text lines to inspect.
Current line index within the source file collection.
Current source indent spacing from left margin.
Collection of comments not yet assigned to objects.
member.returns: The new index at which to continue searching for the next entity.
member.remarks: This version only performs one find prior to returning to caller to prevent false positives on various branching logic expressions.

member.name: M:PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection.Summarize(PyDoc.VariableInfoCollection,PyDoc.IDrillableStat,System.String)
member.summary: Summarize the members of this collection for inclusion in an enumeration.
member.param: Reference to the collection to be inspected.
Reference to the parent statistics controller.
Description to place within the section, as it applies to the caller's context.
member.returns: String containing formatted text that can be included in a host file.

member.name: M:PyDoc.VariableInfoItem.GetDocName
member.summary: Return the full document name of this item, including the prefixes set by parent objects.
member.returns: Full document name of this item, including prefixes set by parent objects.
member.remarks: This method does not include the file extension, since documentation can be written in different file formats. The final extension will be appended by the formatter.

Collection of source text lines to inspect.
Current line index within the source file collection.
Current source indent spacing from left margin.
Collection of comments not yet assigned to objects.
